Title: Gone (1)
Plot: Someone is targeting young 4400's and Maia gets kidnapped. A mistake from Shawn's past comes back to haunt him. Richard is given a position of authority at the 4400 Center.
GuestStars: Alice Krige,  Kathryn Gordon,  Sophie Barnett,  Cainan Wiebe,  Alexia Fast,  Matthew Gray,  Julia Tortolano
